properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
   '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS SRC_SYS_CD
, TRIM(container.CONTAINERID) as CNTNR_ID
, TRIM(container.CURRENTSTATUSID) as CNTNR_STS_ID
, TRIM(container.MFGORDERID) as MFG_ORDR_ID
, TRIM(container.PRODUCTID) as PROD_ID
, NULL as ANCIL_JOB_IND
, TRIM(container.ARCHIVESTATUS) as ARCH_STS_CD
, TRIM(container.BATCHCOMMENTS) as BTCH_COMT_TXT
, NULL as BTCH_DSPO_CD
, TRIM(container.BATCHID) as BTCH_ID
, TRIM(container.BATCHSTATUS) as BTCH_STS_CD
, NULL as BTCH_STS_2_CD
, TRIM(container.BILLOFPROCESSID) as BILL_OF_PRCS_ID
, TRIM(container.BOMID) as BOM_ID
, TRIM(container.BULKPACKTYPE) as BULK_PACK_TYPE_CD
, NULL as CALC_QTY_REQ_IND
, TRIM(container.CARTONSTATUS) as CTN_STS_CD
, TRIM(container.CARTONVERIFICATIONDETAINSTATUS) as CTN_VERIF_DETAIN_STS_CD
, to_timestamp(container.caselabelreconciliationdatetim, \"MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss\") as case_lbl_rcnl_dttm
, to_timestamp(container.caseverificationdate, \"MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss\") as case_verif_dttm
, INT(container.CHANGECOUNT) as CHG_CNT
, INT(container.CHILDCOUNT) as CHILD_CNT
, TRIM(container.COLLECTDHRLINE12) as COLL_DHR_LINE_12_CD
, TRIM(container.CONTAINERCOMMENTS) as CNTNR_COMT_TXT
, CAST(container.THISCONTAINERLOST AS BOOLEAN) as CNTNR_LOST_IND
, TRIM(container.CONTAINERNAME) as CNTNR_NM
, CAST(container.QTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as CNTNR_2_QTY
, NULL as CNTNR_PARNT_PROXY_ID
, TRIM(container.CONVERTEDPARENTLOTNAME) as CNV_PARNT_LOT_NM
, NULL as CNTED_FOR_STERILIZATION_IND
, INT(container.CURRENTHOLDCOUNT) as CUR_HOLD_CNT
, CAST(container.QTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as CUR_QTY
, INT(container.CURRENTTHRUPUTCHILDCOUNT) as CUR_THRUPUT_CHILD_CNT
, CAST(container.CURRENTTHRUPUTQTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as CUR_THRUPUT_QTY
, CAST(container.CURRENTTHRUPUTQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as CUR_THRUPUT_2_QTY
, INT(container.CURRENTTHRUPUTUNITCOUNT) as CUR_THRUPUT_UNIT_CNT
, NULL as CURLY_ASGN_BTCH_ID
, TRIM(container.CUSTOMERID) as CUST_ID
, TRIM(container.DETAILID) as DTL_ID
, NULL as DVC_ID
, CAST(container.DHRDATACOLLECTED AS BOOLEAN) as DHR_DATA_COLLD_IND
, NULL as DOC_CNT
, case when container.duedate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.duedate,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end as DUE_DTTM
, case when container.duedategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.duedategmt,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end as DUE_GMT_DTTM
, NULL as EQMNT_ID
, NULL as EQMNT_RUN_NUM
, case when container.expirationdate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.expirationdate,14), \"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as EXPN_DTTM
, case when container.expirationdategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.expirationdategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as EXPN_GMT_DTTM
,to_timestamp(expirationdateudi, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as EXPN_UDI_DTTM
, case when container.factorystartdate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.factorystartdate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as FCTRY_STRT_DTTM
, case when container.factorystartdategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.factorystartdategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as FCTRY_STRT_GMT_DTTM
, CAST(container.FACTORYSTARTQTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as FCTRY_STRT_QTY
, CAST(container.FACTORYSTARTQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as FCTRY_STRT_2_QTY
, TRIM(container.FACTORYSTARTUOMID) as FCTRY_STRT_UOM_ID
, TRIM(container.FACTORYSTARTUOM2ID) as FCTRY_STRT_UOM_2_ID
, TRIM(container.FOILSTATUS) as FOIL_STS_CD
, NULL as GEL_LOT_NUM
, TRIM(container.HOLDREASONID) as HOLD_RSN_ID
, NULL as IN_QC_IND
, CAST(container.INTRODUCEUNSTERISPLITILOT AS BOOLEAN) as INTRO_UNSTERILIZED_SPLT_LOT_IN
, CAST(container.ISAUTHORIZEDFORDESTRUCTION AS BOOLEAN) as IS_AUTH_FOR_DESTRUCTION_IND
, NULL as IS_AUTO_STRT_IND
, NULL as IS_CARR_IND
, CAST(container.ISCLOSEDASORPHAN AS BOOLEAN) as IS_CLSE_AS_ORPHAN_IND
, CAST(container.ISDESTROY AS BOOLEAN) as IS_DSTRY_IND
, NULL as IS_FAIL_IND
, CAST(container.ISINPROCESSSPLIT AS BOOLEAN) as IS_IN_PRCS_SPLT_IND
, CAST(container.ISINITIALRECONCOMPLETE AS BOOLEAN) as IS_INIT_RECON_CMPLT_IND
, CAST(container.ISINTRODUCED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_INTRO_IND
, NULL as IS_INV_LOC_IND
, NULL as IS_JDE_CMPLT_IND
, CAST(container.ISLABELSRECONCILED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LBL_RECONCLID_IND
, CAST(container.ISLASTSPLIT AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LAST_SPLT_IND
, CAST(container.ISLEGACYAPPABSORPTION AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LGCY_APP_ABSR_IND
, CAST(container.ISLOTABORTED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LOT_ABRT_IND
, CAST(container.ISLOTCONVERTED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LOT_CNV_IND
, CAST(container.ISLOTREVIEWCOMPLETE AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LOT_REV_CMPLT_IND
, CAST(container.ISMASTERLOT AS BOOLEAN) as IS_MSTR_LOT_IND
, CAST(container.ISPLCVERSIONREQUIRED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_PLC_VERS_REQ_IND
, CAST(container.ISREADYTORECON AS BOOLEAN) as IS_READY_TO_RECON_IND
, CAST(container.ISRECONCILED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_RCNLD_IND
, CAST(container.ISRELEASED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_RELS_IND
, CAST(container.ISRETURNEDFORDESTRUCTION AS BOOLEAN) as IS_RTRN_FOR_DESTRUCTION_IND
, CAST(container.ISSTERIPASS AS BOOLEAN) as IS_STERILIZATION_PAS_IND
, CAST(container.ISTOTALLYCONVERTED AS BOOLEAN) as IS_TOTLY_CNV_IND
, TRIM(container.ISSUEDTOCONTAINERID) as ISS_TO_CNTNR_ID
, NULL as JOB_EQUIP_PROD_STS_ID
, case when container.lastactivitydate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.lastactivitydate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as LAST_ACTV_DTTM
, case when container.lastactivitydategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.lastactivitydategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as LAST_ACTV_GMT_DTTM
, case when container.lastcompletiondate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.lastcompletiondate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as LAST_CMPLT_DTTM
, case when container.lastcompletiondategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.lastcompletiondategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as LAST_CMPLT_GMT_DTTM
, NULL as LAST_PARNT_ID
, TRIM(container.LASTREVTXNID) as LAST_REV_TXN_ID
, TRIM(container.LEVELID) as LVL_ID
, TRIM(container.LOTENDREASONID) as LOT_END_RSN_ID
, TRIM(container.LOTSTARTREASONID) as LOT_STRT_RSN_ID
, NULL as MFG_DTTM
, NULL as MFG_GMT_DTTM
,to_timestamp(manufacturingdateudi, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as MFG_UDI_DTTM
, NULL as MAINT_REQ_ID
, NULL as MAINT_STS_ID
, TRIM(container.MASTERLOTNAME) as MSTR_LOT_NM
, TRIM(container.MASTERRECIPEID) as MSTR_RECIPE_ID
, CAST(container.MOVEDTOQCTIME AS BOOLEAN) as MOV_TO_QC_TIME_IND
, NULL as NC_REF_ID
, TRIM(container.CDOTypeID) as OBJ_TYPE_ID
, case when container.onholddate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.onholddate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as ON_HOLD_DTTM
, TRIM(container.ORIGINALCONTAINERID) as ORIG_CNTNR_ID
, TRIM(container.ORIGINALFACTORYID) as ORIG_FCTRY_ID
, CAST(container.ORIGINALQTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as ORIG_QTY
, CAST(container.ORIGINALQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as ORIG_2_QTY
, case when container.originalstartdate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.originalstartdate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as ORIG_STRT_DTTM
, case when container.originalstartdategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.originalstartdategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as ORIG_STRT_GMT_DTTM
, TRIM(container.ORIGINALUOMID) as ORIG_UOM_ID
, TRIM(container.ORIGINALUOM2ID) as ORIG_UOM_2_ID
, TRIM(container.OWNERID) as OWN_ID
, TRIM(container.PALLETID) as PLLT_ID
, TRIM(container.PARENTCONTAINERID) as PARNT_CNTNR_ID
, TRIM(container.PDDCSTATUS) as PDDC_STS_CD
, TRIM(container.PLANNEDPRODUCTID) as PLAN_PROD_ID
, CAST(container.PLANNEDQTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as PLAN_QTY
, TRIM(container.PLANNEDQTYUOMID) as PLAN_QTY_UOM_ID
, CAST(container.PLANNEDQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as PLAN_2_QTY
, TRIM(container.PLANNEDQTYUOM2ID) as PLAN_2_QTY_UOM_ID
, case when container.plannedstartdate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.plannedstartdate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as PLAN_STRT_DTTM
, case when container.plannedstartdategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.plannedstartdategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as PLAN_STRT_GMT_DTTM
, TRIM(container.PLCVERSIONSTATUS) as PLC_VERS_STS_CD
, CAST(container.PLCDHRMISMATCH AS BOOLEAN) as PLCDHR_MSMCH_IND
, CAST(container.PLCDHRNODATA AS BOOLEAN) as PLCDHR_NO_DATA_IND
, TRIM(container.PRIORITYCODEID) as PRIR_CD
, TRIM(container.PRODUCTCONVLOTSTATUS) as PROD_CONV_LOT_STS_CD
, NULL as PRDTN_ID
, TRIM(container.RACKID) as RACK_ID
, INT(container.RECONCOUNT) as RECON_CNT
, case when container.requestdate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.requestdate,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as RQST_DTTM
, case when container.requestdategmt = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(container.requestdategmt,14),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") end as RQST_GMT_DTTM
, INT(container.RELATIVEPRIORITY) as REL_PRIR_NBR
, TRIM(container.REWORKCASEVERIFIED) as RWRK_CASE_VRFY_CD
, TRIM(container.SALESORDERID) as SLS_ORDR_ID
, NULL as SMPLG_LOT_ID
, CAST(container.SAMPLINGPASSED AS BOOLEAN) as SMPLG_PASED_IND
, CAST(container.SAMPLINGREQUIRED AS BOOLEAN) as SMPLG_REQ_IND
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as SMPLG_RSULT_QTY
, NULL as SMPLG_STS_CD
, NULL as SMPLG_TEST_STS_PASED_IND
, NULL as SEQ_NBR
, TRIM(container.SPECSTATUSID) as SPEC_STS_ID
, TRIM(container.SPLITFROMID) as SPLT_FROM_ID
, TRIM(container.STARTREASONID) as STRT_RSN_ID
, CAST(container.QTYSTARTED AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as STRT_QTY
, TRIM(container.STATUS) as STS_CD
, INT(container.STERICOUNT) as STERILIZATION_CNT
, NULL as STERILIZATION_DTTM
, CAST(container.STERILIZATIONTIME AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as STERILIZATION_TM
, TRIM(container.STERILIZATIONLINEID) as STERILIZATION_LINE_ID
, TRIM(container.STERILIZATIONRUNID) as STERILIZATION_RUN_ID
, INT(container.THRUPUTADJUSTMENTCHILDCOUNT) as THRUPUT_ADJ_CHILD_CNT
, CAST(container.THRUPUTADJUSTMENTQTY AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as THRUPUT_ADJ_QTY
, CAST(container.THRUPUTADJUSTMENTQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) as THRUPUT_ADJ_2_QTY
, INT(container.THRUPUTADJUSTMENTUNITCOUNT) as THRUPUT_ADJ_UNIT_CNT
, CAST(NULL as DECIMAL(18,4)) as TOT_PEND_QTY
, CAST(NULL as DECIMAL(18,4)) as TOT_THRUPUT_QTY
, CAST(NULL as DECIMAL(18,4)) as TOT_THRUPUT_2_QTY
, NULL as UDI_CD
, INT(container.UNITCOUNT) as UNIT_CNT
, TRIM(container.UOMID) as UOM_ID
, TRIM(container.UOM2ID) as UOM_2_ID
, TRIM(container.VENDORITEMID) as VEND_ITM_ID
, TRIM(container.WIPMSGDEFMGRID) as WIP_MSG_DEF_MGR_ID
, TRIM(container.WIPSTATUS) as WIP_STS_CD
FROM  {Config.sourceDatabase}.container as container  WHERE container._deleted_ = 'F'
  
 
""")
